blog.title: Website updated!
blog.body:
I used to use Jekyll for SSG, but I switched it to Next.js, which is rumored to be fast. I've also been using Hatena Blog for my blog, but I wanted to write about technology and research, so I decided to use microCMS as HeadlessCMS.

In order to use p5.js from Next.js, I had to use a dynamic import of react-p5, which was a bit of a stumbling block, but overall it was a pretty easy transition!
